item.title: How to Design Metrics With Prometheus Metric Types
item.description: This is the second part of a series about designing metrics for event-driven systems. You can check the first part of this series. Prometheus is open source system for monitoring and alerting. It is a part of CNCF (Cloud Native Computing Foundation) and it is one of the most popular monitoring systems. You can say it is a de facto standard for monitoring in Kubernetes. To design metrics with Prometheus, you need to understand its metric types.
